author: Hiroshi Shimodaira and Jun Okui and Mitsuru Nakai
title: Modified Minimum Classification Error Learning and Its Application to Neural Networks
window: #. This shows the proposed approach is more effective than the McDermott's approach [5] discussed in Section 3. B. Results of Multi-Class Problems In order to evaluate the performance on different datasets, speech database isolet (isolated alphabet letters) of the UCI repository, and "vowels" (Japanese five vowels) made from the ATR continuous speech database "Set-B" were collected.
